header: Jeremiah Accuses Hananiah of Being a False Prophet

verse: Later that same year, in the fifth month of the fourth year that Zedekiah was king, the prophet Hananiah son of Azzur from Gibeon came up to me in the temple. And while the priests and others in the temple were listening,
he told me that the Lord had said:
The priests and the others were still standing there, so I said:
Hananiah grabbed the wooden yoke from my neck and smashed it.
Then he said, “The Lord says this is the way he will smash the power Nebuchadnezzar has over the nations, and it will happen in less than two years.”
and a little while later, the Lord told me
to go back and say to Hananiah:
